Skills: • BS degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or relevant field.
• Additional certification in Microsoft or similar technologies is preferred.
• Proven work experience as a Technical Support Engineer, Desktop Support Engineer, IT Help Desk Technician, or similar role.
• Hands-on experience with Windows OS/iOS & Android environments.
• Good understanding of computer systems, mobile devices, and other tech products
• Ability to diagnose and troubleshoot all technical issues related to Hardware and Software by oneself.
• A basic understanding of network technologies and troubleshooting network issues is a must.
• Basic troubleshooting of hardware like issues related to desktop, laptop & printers is a must.
• A basic understanding of software applications like Office/ AutoCAD/Primavera/ Adobe technologies and troubleshooting software issues is a must.
• Ability to provide step-by-step technical help.
• Should be able to handle and work in a stressful environment.
• Should be able to provide L1 and L2 support for end-users.
• Should have an understanding of installing and configuring computer systems and network peripherals.
